title: What's Next for Microsoft, Activision After U.K. Rejects Deal
description: Regulatory scrutiny had always been high around the world, and now the companies may need to find a Plan B.

title: Elizabeth Holmes's Prison Reporting Date Is Delayed
description: The Theranos founder, convicted of fraud, asked the Ninth U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals to let her stay out of prison while her case makes its way through the court.

title: Tech Companies Face New Scrutiny From Regulators
description: The rejection of Microsoft’s Activision takeover by a U.K. watchdog reflects antitrust headwinds for large tech companies.

title: China Dominates U.S. Solar Market as Lawmakers Tussle Over Tariffs
description: China’s share of the U.S. solar market is expected to rise, new data show, even as Congress debates tariffs to limit it.

title: Microsoft's $75 Billion Activision Deal Rejected by U.K.
description: The country’s competition regulator said the deal would hurt competition in the videogaming industry, raising new bar amid FTC and EU scrutiny.

title: Meta Expected to Report Fourth Straight Quarterly Sales Drop
description: The Facebook parent is facing weak advertiser demand and privacy headwinds.

title: TikTok Ban in Montana Faces Speed Bump as Governor Seeks Changes
description: Gov. Greg Gianforte is requesting amendments to the bill to broaden it to all social-media apps that provide certain data to foreign adversaries.
